Home Buying Tips

How to Choose the Right Unit

Consider the number of family members and living habits. Choose a unit that meets your long-term needs. Pay attention to the number of bedrooms, functional areas, and usable space.

Orientation and Lighting

North-South oriented units have good ventilation and ample lighting. Main living spaces should face south to ensure sufficient sunlight and enhance living comfort.

Space Layout

A reasonable layout can improve quality of life. Pay attention to the separation of active and quiet areas, bathroom placement, and storage space design to meet daily needs.
